page.title: 15Recreation in Hartlepool
page.content: {5. What can adults do?} Adults can enjoy the walks and flowers in the public parks. There are many pubs, clubs and restaurants for social gatherings. Ladies can join the Townswomen's Guilds which hold monthly meetings in several areas of Hartlepool. The International Toastmistresses Club have a branch in the town which meets at Wilton Grange. Toc H has two branches. Older gentlemen can meet with the Retired Mens Forum each week in the Athenaeum. Keen gardeners can join the Gardeners Guild which gives advice on soil and plants to grow in Hartlepool and encourages the tenants of the allotments in their endeavours. Many men and ladies play bowls indoor in winter and in various public parks in the summer.
